attributes.action: instruct the relavant Government department to release the appropriate funds to Palmers College Grays Thurrock to enable them to re open their swimming pool for the benefit of the local community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This pool was used by the college and the community for a number of years. Due to structual issues the pool was closed and a request for repairs funding was made. Money was then promised to the college but this money never materialised. This Petition is to remind the Prime Minister that his departments and associated agencies should make good their promises. 
In an era where we are urged to take up a health life style facilities such as this pool are urgently needed.
